title: Double thrill Monday!
body: After a huge amount of development and testing, GlassFish V2 and NetBeans 6.0 Beta1 are finally out. The best way to get both is via the combined download on the NetBeans site. I've been regularly downloading the dailies for quite a while: NB6 has shaped up to be a huge step forward. There's a lot of stuff in there, it's hard to pick a "favorite", but I'd have to go with all the stuff that flows from the unified semantic model.
